meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the October 8, 2024 City Council Meeting
Authorize settlement of the bodily injury claims brought by Demariyea Williams
agenda_items.description: Settlement in the lawsuit styled Untrell Calhoun, Demariyea Williams, and Tiffany Shipp v. City of Dallas, Cause No. DC-23-18179

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Israel Selgado v. City of Dallas
Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Thomas Meagher v. City of Dallas
An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas Waterworks and Sewer System Revenue Bonds, Series 2024C
agenda_items.description: In the amount of $34,000,000 to the Texas Water Development Board

agenda_items.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the construction services contract with Flatiron Constructors, Inc.
agenda_items.description: To amend the scope of work to include infrastructure for the de-icing facility at the airport

agenda_items.title: An ordinance granting a private license to Tyler J. Duff
agenda_items.description: For the use of approximately 1,180 square feet of land to install, occupy, maintain and utilize landscape and irrigation
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management

agenda_items.title: An ordinance granting a revocable license to BIG D Lil’ d LLC dba Dot’s Hop House & Cocktail Courtyard
agenda_items.description: For the use of approximately 8 square feet of aerial space to occupy, maintain and utilize a blade sign
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management

agenda_items.title: An ordinance granting renewal of a private license to Ross Tower SCHPI LP
agenda_items.description: For the use of approximately 948 square feet of subsurface space to occupy, maintain and utilize an existing transformer vault
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management

agenda_items.title: Authorize (1) the option to an existing license agreement with American Towers, LLC
agenda_items.description: To exercise the first of two, five-year renewal options for approximately 14,895 square feet of land and tower space
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management

financial_items.description: Settlement of lawsuit Israel Selgado v. City of Dallas
Settlement of lawsuit Thomas Meagher v. City of Dallas
Issuance of Waterworks and Sewer System Revenue Bonds
Construction services contract with Flatiron Constructors, Inc.
